caption.p: Structure of SARS-CoV-2 (2019-nCoV) spike (S) protein in the prefusion conformation. Side and top views of the prefusion structure of SARS-CoV-2 S protein with a single receptor-binding domain (RBD) in the ‘up’ conformation. The two RBD ‘down’ protomers are shown in either purple or red, and the RBD ‘up’ protomer is shown in green. Figure was modified from Wrapp et al. [38]. SARS-CoV-2 (2019-nCoV), severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (2019 novel coronavirus).
